thread.title: The sad story of Amazon Video on Chromecast and Android TV
thread.title_full: The sad story of Amazon Video on Chromecast and Android TV - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: The sad story of Amazon Video on Chromecast and Android TV
text:
Although Amazon Prime is one of the most popular streaming video services, today you can’t easily access it on one of the most popular streaming video devices.
That’s because Amazon doesn’t support Google’s $35 Chromecast dongle, which has sold more than 17 million units and it trails only Roku in U.S. sales and usage. Amazon also lacks an app for Android TV set-top boxes such as the Nexus Player, Nvidia Shield Android TV, and Razer Forge TV.
